en.description:
Tek Gravity - Melee: Slam Attacks pull enemies within 20m to the point of impact.

Set Bonus: Kavats create a 10m wide zone every 15 secs, which deals 50 damage/s for 8 secs.

ru.description:
Tek Gravity - Melee: Slam Attacks pull enemies within 20m to the point of impact.

Set Bonus: Kavats create a 10m wide zone every 15 secs, which deals 50 damage/s for 8 secs.
